entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
